He knows all dharmas, cuts off all doubts, possesses all knowledge, and is the teacher of humans and gods. At that time, after the youth had praised in this way, he circumambulated three times, bowed at the Buddha's feet, and then sat to one side, wishing to hear the wonderful Dharma. He also gave rise to the thought:
I was born in the royal palace and have this blessed retribution, possessing great power and influence. What are the causes and effects of this?
